actions: Nourishes the Heart and calms the Spirit.
Nourishes Jing and Blood, fills the Marrow and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin, benefits Jing and brightens the eyes.
With Shu Di Huang, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency.
With Ju Hua, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency with Jing and Blood unable to rise and nourish the eyes with tinnitus, headache, and visual impairment.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and Body Fluids, tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and strengthens Kidney Yang.
With Wu Wei Zi, for spermatorrhea, abnormal sweating, palpitations and shortness of breath due to Yin and Yang Deficiency of the Liver and Kidneys.
With Shu Di Huang, nourishes Kidney Yin and secures Jing, while restraining urination and sweating.
Quiets the Spirit, calms and contains Heart Qi, tonifies the Kidneys, astringes Jing and stops diarrhea and spermatorrhea
Tonifies Heart Qi, calms the Spirit and treats impotence.
Strengthens the Spleen, quiets the Heart, calms the Spirit and soothes the nerves.
Promotes the movement of Heart Qi and Blood and stimulates Blood circulation.
Promotes the movement of Qi and reduces distention and pressure.
Warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Heart, strengthens Yang and Ming Men Fire and assists in the generation of Qi and Blood.

symptoms: Inability to get or maintain an erection
Cough with little or no sputum
Five Sole Heat due to stress
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white or None or Thin and greasy
manifestations.pulse: Knotted or Intermittent or Minute, forceless and Deficient or Thready and rapid or Wiry and thready
